description: Collects information about available updates on a target system

provider.description: What update provider to use. For Linux (RHEL, Debian, SUSE, etc.) this parameter is not used. For Windows the available values are: 'windows', 'chocolatey', 'all' (both 'windows' and 'chocolatey'). The default value for Windows is 'all'. If 'all' is passed and Chocolatey isn't installed then Chocolatey will simply be skipped. If 'chocolatey' is passed and Chocolatey isn't installed, then this will error.
